import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../assests/avatar_2.jpeg' import styles from '../components/styles/Username.module.css' import { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import { passwordValidate } from '../helper/validate'; const Recovery = () => { // using formik documentation for this const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { password: '' }, validate: passwordValidate, validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, onSubmit: async values => { //On submit displaying values in console console.log(values); } }) return (
